accessDialog.permissionWarningMsg: . Please contact your study administrator if you require access to this section.
accessDialog.accessInformation: -section can't be viewd. Acccess requires following permissions:

dialog.description: Enter the base information of your study to provide basic information for collaborators and participants.

error.missedFieldsMsg: Please fill out the following information fields:

placeholder.emptyPurpose: Purpose information hasn't been added yet. To add purpose information, edit the study details.
placeholder.emptyParticipantInfo: Participant information hasn't been added yet. To add participant information, edit the study details.
placeholder.emptyConsentInfo: Enter your description for the consent information.
placeholder.purposeInput: Please provide a short description of your research purpose for your collaborators.
placeholder.participantInfoInput: Please provide information for study participants. This description will be visible at the participant's app.
placeholder.consentInfoInput: Please provide information on the data that will be collected. This description will be visible at the participant's app.

dialog.addRole: Please choose at least one role to continue or cancel.
dialog.addCollaboratorInfo: will be added to your Collaboratorlist.

error.noValidJson: Cannot parse properties. No valid JSON.
error.addSchedulerMsg: Please set the scheduler for your observation.

placeholder.emptySchedulerMsg: Please provide a schedule for your observation.

dialog.title: Intervention Details
dialog.description: Enter your intervention's base information and configuration. Add the trigger configuration and at least one action to continue.

title: Title
name: Name
deleteMsg: Are you sure you want to delete
observationListDescr: An observation can be sensor data from a mobile phone or a wearable device or information gathered from a questionnaire.
interventionListDescr: An intervention describes an action delivered to the app triggered by rules on data.
welcomeMessage: Dear {userName} ({userInstitution}), welcome to your Dashboard of the MORE project. Start by creating a new study or managing existing studies you have been assigned to collaborate on.
linkCopy: Link for '{title}' study (ID: {studyId}) was copied to your clipboard.

placeholder.emptyPurposeOnOverview: Purpose information hasn't been added yet. To add purpose information, edit the study details.
placeholder.interventionScheduler: Please provide a schedule for your intervention

listDescription.participantList: This is the list of participants of your study. You can add or import participants.
listDescription.emptyParticipantList: Add and manage your study's participants. Your participants will be listed here.
listDescription.studyList: This is the list of your studies and studies you were invited to as a collaborator.
listDescription.emptyStudyGroupList: Add groups to your study to use group functionalities. Your study groups will be listed here.
listDescription.emptyObservationList: Add and manage your study's observations. Your observations will be listed here.
listDescription.emptyInterventionList: Add and manage your study's interventions. Your interventions will be listed here.
listDescription.data: Data collected during the study will be visualized within this dashboard.

info.generalInfo: Provide a number, a list of numbers (e.g. 1,2,3) or a range (e.g. 12-14)
info.questionMark: No specific value (e.g. any day of the week)
